long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert text to binary code with the Text to Binary Converter extension. This user-friendly tool allows you to effortlessly convert any text into binary format. Designed with simplicity in mind, the extension provides a seamless experience with its intuitive interface. Simply enter your text, click the convert button, and instantly get the binary representation. Copy the converted code to your clipboard, clear the text, or even download the binary for offline use.

This Extension is Created by Suman Help Developers, this extension is a must-have for developers, students, and anyone needing to work with binary code. Get the Text to Binary Converter extension now and streamline your text-to-binary conversions!
